p.s: I think I've never been so angry at someone.
How could I ever have looked up to him?
He is betraying ishis own family.
By rejecting his culture and deniingdenying his origin he also is rejecting me.
I loved my uncle and it hurts so much to realize that he is not the person I thought he was.
I mean who always said the QuaranQuran is brutal, but then he beats up his own wife...
He is not honest with himself.
He thinks his life is better in America but that is not true.
He lost his job, he gets discriminated on a daily basis because of his appearance but instead of trying to understand my anger and frustration he denies that these things happen.
It's not right that my life is more difficult because I am not from America.
I am going to turn on my own people, no matter how much the FBIFederal Bureau of Investigation pressures me.
I would rather go back to Pakistan than beeingbeing suspected all the time.
At least I would be like everyone else there.
Amir is going to stay here in his self-hatred.
He is never going to be happy because he is denying the truth.
But he also deserves no better.
